title: Issue with hextech crafting
body: I forged a gemstone into a hextech chest & key and when i went to open the chest, hextech froze so i went to the store and came back but when i came back the chest and key was gone and i also did not get any loot so i effectively just lost a chest and key.

replies.body: No worries, it  it reached our servers but the animation froze.  This can happen if you have third party programs running in the background, or might need to enable[ low spec mode](https://i.gyazo.com/a39e12ca76e54359342203c476a0e9c1.png).  Looking into this for you perosnally, it looks like you got 150 orange essences and--holy moly-- The Ocean Week Fizz summoner icon.  Very nice!!
Alright thank you, I will patiently await it being placed into my account.
I never did get the icon or essences
